name: selenium-rs
onCreateCommand: git config user.name $(git --no-pager log --pretty="%an" | head -n 1) && git config user.email $(git --no-pager log --pretty="%ce" | head -n 1) && (test -e geckodriver || ( if [ "$(arch)" = "aarch64" ] ; then export F="linux-aarch64"; else export F="linux64"; fi && wget -O gec.tar.gz "https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases/download/v0.36.0/geckodriver-v0.36.0-$F.tar.gz" && tar -xf gec.tar.gz && rm -rf gec.tar.gz ) ) && cargo clean && cargo build
